about_the_game: Journey into the realm of Aradena, a mystical kingdom on the brink of collapse, under the tyrannical rule of a deranged King and the shadowy Elders of Fate. Heroes must battle in the perilous colosseum for riches and glory, all to vie for the chance to dethrone the vile King and restore health to Aradena. Step into the historic battlegrounds to experience thrilling Tactical TCG gameplay, where cards come to life on a 3D, hextile battleboard to fight. It’s your time to reclaim the Kingdom.

content_descriptors.notes:
Welcome to Aradena: Battlegrounds. Before you venture into our world, we'd like to advise you of the mature content contained within.

This game portrays scenes of violence involving fantasy characters, reminiscent of medieval combat and warfare. These depictions may include, but are not limited to, sword fights, magical battles, and confrontations with mythical creatures. While these characters and settings are fictional, the representations can be graphic and intense.
